title: Holy ornament kit

properties.name: description
properties.value: The holy ornament kit is an ornament kit that can be obtained as a tertiary drop from completing a Theatre of Blood raid in Hard Mode. It can be used on the scythe of Vitur, converting it into a holy scythe of Vitur; the Ghrazi rapier, converting it into the Holy ghrazi rapier; or the Sanguinesti staff, converting it into the Holy sanguinesti staff.

Item ID25742

The holy ornament kit is an ornament kit that can be obtained as a tertiary drop from completing a Theatre of Blood raid in Hard Mode. It can be used on the scythe of Vitur, converting it into a holy scythe of Vitur; the Ghrazi rapier, converting it into the Holy ghrazi rapier; or the Sanguinesti staff, converting it into the Holy sanguinesti staff.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • This item was initially named as "Justiciar ornament kit", but was changed shortly before release.

[[File:Holy ornament kit detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''holy ornament kit''' is an [[ornament kit]] that can be obtained as a tertiary drop from completing a [[Theatre of Blood]] raid in Hard Mode. It can be used on the [[scythe of Vitur]], converting it into a [[holy scythe of Vitur]]; the [[Ghrazi rapier]], converting it into the [[Holy ghrazi rapier]]; or the [[Sanguinesti staff]], converting it into the [[Holy sanguinesti staff]].

{{Drop sources|Holy ornament kit}}

==Products==
{{Uses material list|Holy ornament kit}}

==Trivia==
*This item was initially named as "Justiciar ornament kit", but was changed shortly before release.
